review: Did not work on my tv, did not come with documentation, and wires were already connected like it was used
author: Sheneza Hardial

review: i use it in hotels constantly with a Portable Router. NEVER I WILL WATCH TAE BO ADVERTISING ON HOLIDAY INN EVER AGAIN.
author: Roque Junior "Roque Santos Junior"

review: Originally purchased a Roku stick, but it had a lot of issues with input lag, long loading times, and poor video quality. I assume much of this was due to poor internet connectivity, despite my connection consistently reading >25mbps on my phone. This device works flawlessly, displaying consistent 1080p with very fast load times. Have not tried to using any of it's chrome browser mirroring, so keep that in mind.
author: j_dillon

review: I bought a pair of these for the office thinking I would replace the HDMI cable, turns out is does not work that way. There are ways to make it work to project your desktop to the screen but too much work. It is OK for home entertainment use but not for projecting your stuff for work.
author: RDU23

review: Junk! Barely works from 20 feet away and the streaming was awful.
author: Travlin' Easy

review: Spend the extra money and get Roku. We've had nothing but problems.
